00046 void QuartusGenerator::setBoardName(QSharedPointer<Component> component) {
00047         // clear the old assignments
00048         assignments_.clear();
00049 
00050         // find the file wrapper that holds the assignments
00051         File* fileWrapper = component->getQuartusPinmap();
00052 
00053         // if theres no fileset for quartus projects
00054         if (!fileWrapper) {
00055                 emit noticeMessage(tr("No pin map found on the component"));
00056                 return;
00057         }
00058 
00059         QString pinmapPath = General::getAbsolutePath(handler_->getPath(
00060                         *component->getVlnv()), fileWrapper->getName());
00061         
00062         // if the file did not exist
00063         QFileInfo pinmapInfo(pinmapPath);
00064         if (!pinmapInfo.exists()) {
00065                 emit errorMessage(tr("The pin map file %1 was not found in file system").arg(
00066                         pinmapPath));
00067                 return;
00068         }
00069 
00070         // create a text stream to read the pin mappings
00071         QFile mappingsFile(pinmapPath);
00072 
00073         // if the file can not be opened for reading
00074         if (!mappingsFile.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly)) {
00075                 emit errorMessage(tr("File %1 could not be opened for reading").arg(
00076                         pinmapPath));
00077                 return;
00078         }
00079         QTextStream stream(&mappingsFile);
00080 
00081         // read the assignments from the stream
00082         readAssignments(stream);
00083 
00084         mappingsFile.close();
00085 }
00086 
00087 void QuartusGenerator::readAssignments(QTextStream& stream) {
00088 
00089         QString line;
00090 
00091         // as long as theres stuff to read left
00092         while (!stream.atEnd()) {
00093 
00094                 // read a line from the stream
00095                 line = stream.readLine();
00096 
00097                 // split the line wherever there is whitespace
00098                 QStringList lineParameters = line.split(QString(" "),
00099                                 QString::SkipEmptyParts);
00100 
00101                 // get all assignments from the quartus settings file
00102                 //if (lineParameters.at(0) == QString("set_location_assignment")) {
00103                         assignments_.append(line);
00104                 //}
00105         }
00106 }

00108 void QuartusGenerator::generateProject(QString outputPath, const QString& top_entity) {
00109 
00110         // make sure the outputPath is a directory
00111         QFileInfo outPutInfo(outputPath);
00112 
00113         // if was not a directory
00114         if (!outPutInfo.isDir())
00115                 outputPath = outPutInfo.absolutePath();
00116 
00117         // if the output dir doesn't exist then create it
00118         QDir outputDir(outputPath);
00119         if (!outputDir.exists()) {
00120                 outputDir.mkpath(outputPath);
00121         }
00122 
00123         // write the project file
00124         writeQPF(outputPath, top_entity);
00125 
00126         // write the settings file
00127         writeQSF(outputPath, top_entity);
00128 }
00129 
00130 void QuartusGenerator::writeQPF(const QString& outPutDir, const QString& top_entity) {
00131 
00132         // save previous working directory
00133         QDir savedCurrentDir = QDir::current();
00134 
00135         // set the working directory
00136         QDir::setCurrent(outPutDir);
00137 
00138         // create file instance for the project file
00139         QString fileName = top_entity;
00140         fileName.remove(".comp");
00141         fileName += QString(".qpf");
00142         QFile qpfFile(fileName);
00143 
00144         // if file can't be opened for writing
00145         if (!qpfFile.open(QIODevice::WriteOnly | QIODevice::Truncate)) {
00146                 QString msg(tr("Can't open file "));
00147                 msg += qpfFile.fileName();
00148                 msg += tr(" for writing");
00149                 throw std::runtime_error(msg.toStdString());
00150         }
00151 
00152         QTextStream stream(&qpfFile);
00153 
00154         // write the header for project file
00155         writeHeader(stream);
00156 
00157         QString entityName = top_entity;
00158         entityName.remove(".comp");
00159 
00160         // write project info
00161         stream << "QUARTUS_VERSION = \"10.0\"" << endl << endl;
00162         stream << "# Revisions" << endl << endl;
00163         stream << "PROJECT_REVISION = \"";
00164         stream << entityName;
00165         stream << "\"" << endl;
00166 
00167         qpfFile.close();
00168 
00169         // restore previous working directory
00170         QDir::setCurrent(savedCurrentDir.path());
00171 }

00173 void QuartusGenerator::writeQSF(const QString& outputDir, const QString& top_entity) {
00174         // save previous working directory
00175         QDir savedCurrentDir = QDir::current();
00176 
00177         // set the working directory
00178         QDir::setCurrent(outputDir);
00179 
00180         // create file instance for the project file
00181         QString fileName = top_entity;
00182         fileName.remove(".comp");
00183         fileName += QString(".qsf");
00184         QFile qsfFile(fileName);
00185 
00186         // if file can't be opened for writing
00187         if (!qsfFile.open(QIODevice::WriteOnly | QIODevice::Truncate)) {
00188                 QString msg(tr("Can't open file "));
00189                 msg += qsfFile.fileName();
00190                 msg += tr(" for writing");
00191                 emit errorMessage(msg);
00192                 return;
00193         }
00194 
00195         QTextStream stream(&qsfFile);
00196 
00197         // write the header for the file
00198         writeHeader(stream);
00199 
00200         // write the top level entity
00201         stream << "set_global_assignment -name TOP_LEVEL_ENTITY " << top_entity << endl;
00202 
00203         // write the Quartus version
00204         stream << "set_global_assignment -name ORIGINAL_QUARTUS_VERSION "
00205                 "\"10.0 SP1\"" << endl;
00206 
00207         // write the files
00208         for (int i = 0; i < files_.size(); ++i) {
00209 
00210                 QFileInfo fileInfo(files_.at(i));
00211 
00212                 // if file is vhdl-file
00213                 if (fileInfo.suffix() == QString("vhd")
00214             || fileInfo.suffix() == QString("vhdl") ) {
00215                         stream << "set_global_assignment -name VHDL_FILE " << files_.at(i)
00216                                 << endl;
00217                 }
00218                 // if file is verilog file
00219                 else if (fileInfo.suffix() == QString("v")) {
00220                         stream << "set_global_assignment -name VERILOG_FILE " << files_.at(i)
00221                                 << endl;
00222                 }
00223                 
00224                 // if file is quartus ip file (.qip)
00225                 else if (fileInfo.suffix() == QString("qip")) {
00226                         stream << "set_global_assignment -name QIP_FILE " << files_.at(i)
00227                                 << endl;
00228                 }
00229 
00230         }
00231 
00232         // write the pin assignments
00233         for (int i = 0; i < assignments_.size(); ++i) {
00234                 stream << assignments_.at(i) << endl;
00235         }
00236 
00237         qsfFile.close();
00238 }

00240 void QuartusGenerator::writeHeader(QTextStream& stream) {
00241         stream << "# ----------------------------------------------------------- #"
00242                         << endl << endl;
00243         stream << tr("# Quartus project generated by Kactus2") << endl;
00244         stream << tr("# Date created ") << QDateTime::currentDateTime().toString(
00245                         QString("hh:mm:ss dd.MM.yyyy")) << endl << endl;
00246         stream << "# ----------------------------------------------------------- #"
00247                         << endl << endl;
00248 }

00251 void QuartusGenerator::parseFiles(QSharedPointer<Component> component, const QString& viewName) {
00252 
00253         Q_ASSERT_X(component, "QuartusGenerator::parseFiles",
00254                 "Null component-pointer given as parameter");
00255 
00256         // inform user that component is being processed
00257         emit noticeMessage(tr("Processing view %1 of component %2:%3:%4:%5").arg(
00258                 viewName).arg(
00259                 component->getVlnv()->getVendor()).arg(
00260                 component->getVlnv()->getLibrary()).arg(
00261                 component->getVlnv()->getName()).arg(
00262                 component->getVlnv()->getVersion()));
00263 
00264         // pointer to the named view under given component
00265         View* view = component->findView(viewName);
00266 
00267         // if view was not found
00268         if (!view) {
00269 
00270                 // if component does not contain any views
00271                 if (component->viewCount() == 0) {
00272                         emit noticeMessage(tr("Component %1 didn't contain any views, "
00273                                 "adding all found RTL-files from component file sets.").arg(
00274                                 component->getVlnv()->getName()));
00275 
00276                         parseBlindFileSet(component);
00277                         return;
00278                 }
00279 
00280                 // component did contain views but not the specified view
00281                 else {
00282                         emit errorMessage(tr("View %1 not found within component %2").arg(
00283                                 viewName).arg(component->getVlnv()->getName()));
00284                         return;
00285                 }
00286         }
00287 
00288         // if the view was found but was not hierarchical
00289         if (view && !view->isHierarchical()) {
00290 
00291                 // ask which file sets are included in the view
00292                 QStringList fileSets = view->getFileSetRefs();
00293 
00294                 // parse the file sets from the component and add them to the list of files
00295                 parseFileSets(component, fileSets);
00296         }
00297 
00298         // view was found and was hierarchical
00299         else if (view && view->isHierarchical()) {
00300 
00301                 VLNV designVLNV;
00302                 QSharedPointer<Design> design;
00303 
00304                 VLNV desConfVLNV;
00305                 QSharedPointer<DesignConfiguration> designConf;
00306 
00307                 VLNV vlnv = view->getHierarchyRef();
00308 
00309                 // if the specified vlnv is not found within library
00310                 if (!handler_->contains(vlnv)) {
00311                         emit errorMessage(tr("Hierarchy reference %1:%2:%3:%4 referenced "
00312                                 "within view %5 in component %6 was not found in the library."
00313                                 " Stopping generation.").arg(
00314                                 vlnv.getVendor()).arg(
00315                                 vlnv.getLibrary()).arg(
00316                                 vlnv.getName()).arg(
00317                                 vlnv.getVersion()).arg(
00318                                 viewName).arg(
00319                                 component->getVlnv()->getName()));
00320                         return;
00321                 }
00322 
00323                 // get the real type of the referenced document
00324                 vlnv.setType(handler_->getDocumentType(vlnv));
00325 
00326                 // if component contained reference to a design configuration
00327                 if (vlnv.getType() == VLNV::DESIGNCONFIGURATION) {
00328 
00329                         // parse the design configuration
00330                         desConfVLNV = vlnv;
00331                         QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = handler_->getModel(desConfVLNV);
00332                         designConf = libComp.staticCast<DesignConfiguration>();
00333 
00334                         // find the referenced design
00335                         designVLNV = designConf->getDesignRef();
00336                 }
00337 
00338                 // if component contained direct reference to a design 
00339                 else if (vlnv.getType() == VLNV::DESIGN) {
00340                         designVLNV = vlnv;
00341                 }
00342                 // if item was some other type
00343                 else {
00344                         emit errorMessage(tr("Item %1:%2:%3:%4 was not neither design or "
00345                                 "design configuration, stopping generation.").arg(
00346                                 vlnv.getVendor()).arg(
00347                                 vlnv.getLibrary()).arg(
00348                                 vlnv.getName()).arg(
00349                                 vlnv.getVersion()));
00350                         return;
00351                 }
00352 
00353                 // if design does not exist
00354                 if (!handler_->contains(designVLNV)) {
00355                         emit errorMessage(tr("Design %1:%2:%3:%4 referenced within "
00356                                 "design configuration %5 was not found within library. "
00357                                 "Stopping generation.").arg(
00358                                 designVLNV.getVendor()).arg(
00359                                 designVLNV.getLibrary()).arg(
00360                                 designVLNV.getName()).arg(
00361                                 designVLNV.getVersion()).arg(
00362                                 desConfVLNV.getName()));
00363                         return;
00364                 }
00365 
00366                 // parse the design
00367                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = handler_->getModel(designVLNV);
00368                 design = libComp.staticCast<Design>();
00369 
00370                 // read the design and it's component instances
00371                 readDesign(design, designConf);
00372 
00373                 // if this view contains a reference to a view that contains component's
00374                 // top level implementation
00375                 QString topLevelView = view->getTopLevelView();
00376                 if (!topLevelView.isEmpty()) {
00377                         parseFiles(component, topLevelView);
00378                 }
00379         }
00380 }
00381 
00382 void QuartusGenerator::parseFileSets(QSharedPointer<Component> component, 
00383                                                                          const QStringList& fileSetNames) {
00384         Q_ASSERT_X(component, "ModelsimGenerator::parseFileSets",
00385                 "Null component-pointer given as parameter");
00386 
00387 
00388         QString basePath = handler_->getPath(*component->getVlnv());
00389         if (basePath.isEmpty()) {
00390                 emit errorMessage(tr("Component %1:%2:%3:%4 was not found within "
00391                         "library, stopping generation").arg(
00392                         component->getVlnv()->getVendor()).arg(
00393                         component->getVlnv()->getLibrary()).arg(
00394                         component->getVlnv()->getName()).arg(
00395                         component->getVlnv()->getVersion()));
00396                 return;
00397         }
00398 
00399         // check each file set
00400         foreach (QString fileSetName, fileSetNames) {
00401 
00402                 // if the specified file set was not found within component
00403                 if (!component->hasFileSet(fileSetName)) {
00404                         emit errorMessage(tr("Fileset %1 was not found within component "
00405                                 "%2:%3:%4:%5").arg(fileSetName).arg(
00406                                 component->getVlnv()->getVendor()).arg(
00407                                 component->getVlnv()->getLibrary()).arg(
00408                                 component->getVlnv()->getName()).arg(
00409                                 component->getVlnv()->getVersion()));
00410                         continue;
00411                 }
00412 
00413                 // get the files in the file set
00414                 FileSet* fileSet = component->getFileSet(fileSetName);
00415                 QList<QSharedPointer<File> > fileList = fileSet->getFiles();
00416 
00417                 // handle each file
00418                 foreach (QSharedPointer<File> file, fileList) {
00419 
00420                         // get the absolute path to the file
00421                         QString absolutePath = General::getAbsolutePath(basePath,
00422                                 file->getName());
00423 
00424                         // make sure the file exists in the file system
00425                         QFileInfo fileInfo(absolutePath);
00426                         if (!fileInfo.exists()) {
00427                                 emit errorMessage(tr("The file %1 needed by component %2:%3:%4:%5"
00428                                         " was not found in the file system.").arg(
00429                                         absolutePath).arg(
00430                                         component->getVlnv()->getVendor()).arg(
00431                                         component->getVlnv()->getLibrary()).arg(
00432                                         component->getVlnv()->getName()).arg(
00433                                         component->getVlnv()->getVersion()));
00434 
00435                                 // move on to next file
00436                                 continue;
00437                         }
00438 
00439                         // if the file with options is not yet on the list, add it
00440                         if (!files_.contains(absolutePath))
00441                                 files_.append(absolutePath);
00442                 }
00443         }
00444 }

00446 void QuartusGenerator::readDesign(const QSharedPointer<Design> design,
00447                                                                   const QSharedPointer<DesignConfiguration> desConf) {
00448         Q_ASSERT_X(design, "ModelsimGenerator::readDesign",
00449                 "Null Design-pointer given as parameter");
00450 
00451         // read each component
00452         QList<Design::ComponentInstance> instances = design->getComponentInstances();
00453         foreach (Design::ComponentInstance const& instance, instances) {
00454 
00455                 VLNV vlnv = instance.componentRef;
00456 
00457                 // if component can't be found within library
00458                 if (!handler_->contains(vlnv)) {
00459                         emit errorMessage(tr("Component %1:%2:%3:%4 was not found within "
00460                                 "library, stopping generation").arg(
00461                                 vlnv.getVendor()).arg(
00462                                 vlnv.getLibrary()).arg(
00463                                 vlnv.getName()).arg(
00464                                 vlnv.getVersion()));
00465                         continue;
00466                 }
00467 
00468                 QSharedPointer<Component> component;
00469                 QSharedPointer<LibraryComponent> libComp = handler_->getModel(vlnv);
00470 
00471                 // if library item is component
00472                 if (libComp->getVlnv()->getType() == VLNV::COMPONENT)
00473                         component = libComp.staticCast<Component>();
00474 
00475                 // if item was not component
00476                 else {
00477                         emit errorMessage(tr("Referenced item %1:%2:%3:%4 was not a component").arg(
00478                                 vlnv.getVendor()).arg(
00479                                 vlnv.getLibrary()).arg(
00480                                 vlnv.getName()).arg(
00481                                 vlnv.getVersion()));
00482                         continue;
00483                 }
00484 
00485                 QString viewName;
00486 
00487                 // if design configuration is used
00488                 if (desConf && desConf->hasActiveView(instance.instanceName)) {
00489                         viewName = desConf->getActiveView(instance.instanceName);
00490                 }
00491                 // if design configuration is not used or view was not found
00492                 else {
00493 
00494                         // if component only has one view
00495                         if (component->viewCount() == 1)
00496                                 viewName = component->getViews().first()->getName();
00497 
00498                         // if component has multiple views
00499                         else if (component->viewCount() > 1) {
00500 
00501                                 // ask user to select the view
00502                                 viewName = ComboSelector::selectView(component, parent_);
00503 
00504                                 if (viewName.isEmpty()) {
00505                                         emit noticeMessage(tr("No view selected for component "
00506                                                 "%1:%2:%3:%4, skipping").arg(
00507                                                 vlnv.getVendor()).arg(
00508                                                 vlnv.getLibrary()).arg(
00509                                                 vlnv.getName()).arg(
00510                                                 vlnv.getVersion()));
00511                                         continue;
00512                                 }
00513                         }
00514                 }
00515 
00516                 // call recursively to handle the component instance
00517                 parseFiles(component, viewName);
00518         }
00519 }

00521 void QuartusGenerator::parseBlindFileSet(QSharedPointer<Component> component) {
00522         Q_ASSERT_X(component, "ModelsimGenerator::parseBlindFileSet",
00523                 "Null component pointer given as parameter");
00524 
00525         QString basePath = handler_->getPath(*component->getVlnv());
00526         if (basePath.isEmpty()) {
00527                 emit errorMessage(tr("Component %1:%2:%3:%4 was not found in library."));
00528                 return;
00529         }
00530 
00531         // get all rtl files of the component
00532         QList<QSharedPointer<File> > fileList = component->getRTLFiles();
00533         foreach (QSharedPointer<File> file, fileList) {
00534 
00535                 // get the absolute path to the file
00536                 QString absolutePath = General::getAbsolutePath(basePath,
00537                         file->getName());
00538 
00539                 // make sure the file exists in the file system
00540                 QFileInfo fileInfo(absolutePath);
00541 
00542                 if (!fileInfo.exists()) {
00543                         emit errorMessage(tr("The file %1 needed by component %2:%3:%4:%5"
00544                                 " was not found in the file system.").arg(
00545                                 absolutePath).arg(
00546                                 component->getVlnv()->getVendor()).arg(
00547                                 component->getVlnv()->getLibrary()).arg(
00548                                 component->getVlnv()->getName()).arg(
00549                                 component->getVlnv()->getVersion()));
00550 
00551                         // move on to next file
00552                         continue;
00553                 }
00554                 // if the file with options is not yet on the list, add it
00555                 if (!files_.contains(absolutePath))
00556                         files_.append(absolutePath);
00557         }
00558 }
